content: ssk slip slip knit m marker tbl through back loop p purl notes this pattern uses a gusset heel feel free to insert a different type of heel if you are comfortable doing so gauge is measured in stockinette stitch section 1 the cuff using larger needles co 52 56 60 64 68 stitches and divide onto three dpns as follows size xs needle one 16 sts needle two 20 sts needle three 16 sts size s needle one 20 sts needle two 16 sts needle three 20 sts size m needle one 20 sts needle two 20 sts needle three 20 sts size l needle one 20 sts needle two 24 sts needle three 20 sts size xl needle one 24 sts needle two 20 sts needle three 24 sts copyright 2019 yarn café creations christy houghton vanilla frosting by christy houghton 3 place marker only needed if knitting on 9 circulars and join to knit in the round you will slip the marker if using one before beginning each round switch to smaller needles row 1 * k1 tbl p1 * repeat from * to * to end of row row 2 7 repeat row one you can adjust the height of the cuff to your liking by doing more row or fewer row rearrange stitches so that there are 13 14 15 16 17 sts on needles one and three and 26 28 30 32 34 sts on needle 2 and continue to section two if you would like to have a taller sock you can start knitting in the round at this point and continue knitting until you reach your desired height after you have reached the height you like continue to section two section 2 the heel flap and gusset with your free needle needle four k13 14 15 16 17 off of needle one slip the same number of sts from the third needle onto the opposite end of needle four this will become the needle you will knit your heel on you will now have 26 28 30 32 34 sts on this needle for the heel divide the sts that remain in half and slip them onto two needles evenly you will have 13 14 15 16 17 sts on each of the other two needles you will not be knitting on these again until after you complete the heel flap knit the heel flap using your free needle and with the wrong side facing you complete the heel sts as follows row 1 wrong side sl 1 p to end row 2 * sl 1 k1 * repeat to end repeat row 1 and 2 for 2 2 2 ¼ 2 ¼ 2 ½ repeat row 1 one more time turn the heel row 1 right side k15 16 17 18 19 sts k2tog k1 turn row 2 sl1 purlwise p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 knitwise k6 k2tog k1 turn row 4 sl1 purlwise p7 p2tog p1 turn row
